english.para1:
Aa-Aa-Aa-Aa- ennu kanum yeshu rajane
kaalamai kaalamai parannu povan kalamai
rajathirajan varunnu vegam priyare!
english.para2:
1 Kahalanadham kettidunna nalil
Hallelujah! geetham padidume annu njan-
2 Ennini njan chernnidum ponnumokham kanuvan
Sobhayerum nattil njan poiduvan kalamai -
english.para3:
3 Lokathil njanoru nindithanenkilum
Mekhathil njanoru vathuvai vazhume-
4 Yeshu rajan vannidum bhakthanmare cherkuvan
Sworgathi sworgangalil vasam cheivan kalamai-
english.para4:
5 Mulkirida dhariai kadannupoya priyane
Pon kirida dhariai annu njan kanume-
